resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: XO (Extra Old) was invented in 1870 by another cognac house : Hennessy. It's a cognac whose youngest brandy has aged at least for ten years in an oak barrel. It's the reference for all houses of cognac.
resource.chars: XO (Extra Old) was invented in 1870 by another cognac house : Hennessy. It's a cognac whose youngest brandy has aged at least for ten years in an oak barrel. It's the reference for all houses of cognac.
